mapper.insert: insert ignore into sk_success_killed(usercode, seckill_id, kill_state,expire, valid_ind, create_time, creator_code, update_time, updater_code) VALUES (#{killedPo.usercode}, #{killedPo.seckillId}, #{killedPo.killState},#{killedPo.expire}, #{killedPo.validInd}, #{killedPo.createTime}, #{killedPo.creatorCode}, #{killedPo.updateTime}, #{killedPo.updaterCode})
